attributes.action: Instead of a general election, hold a second EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
In 2016 little was known about the effects of leaving the EU or what any deal would look like. Every party said leaving without a deal would be a disaster. 

3 years later and there is chaos in Westminster and I think it is definitely time for the electorate to have another say now that more information is available and public decision will be better informed.
attributes.background: All current political parties are stating, in varying ways, that 'the people' should choose the way forward. The best and simplest way for us to do this is to have a choice between the current deal, no deal or to remain in the EU. Please sign to let the government know this is our choice.
